description: Defines the conditions and behavior of a rideable entity's boost.

fields.description: List of items that can be used to boost while riding this entity.
This is the damage that the item will take each time it is used.
Name of the item that can be used to boost.
The item used to boost will become this item once it is used up.
Time in seconds for the boost.
Factor by which the entity's normal speed increases. E.g. 2.0 means go twice as fast.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Boostable
generated_doNotEdit.description: Defines the conditions and behavior of a rideable entity's boost.

fields.title: Boost Items
fields.description: List of items that can be used to boost while riding this entity. Each item has the following properties:

subForm.description: List of items that can be used to boost while riding this entity. Each item has the following properties:

fields.title: Damage
fields.description: This is the damage that the item will take each time it is used.

fields.title: Item
fields.description: Name of the item that can be used to boost.

fields.title: Replace Item
fields.description: The item used to boost will become this item once it is used up.

fields.title: Duration
fields.description: Time in seconds for the boost.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Factor by which the entity's normal speed increases. E.g. 2.0 means go twice as fast. Requires "format_version" of 1.20 or more, otherwise the value 1.35 will be used.
